scripts.deploy:juno: dfx deploy icrc-factory --network juno --upgrade-unchanged --argument "(variant { Init = record { cycles_ledger = null } })"
scripts.wasm:prod: npm run wasm:ledger:prod && npm run wasm:index:prod
scripts.wasm:ledger:juno: dfx canister call icrc-factory --network juno set_ledger_wasm_from_url "(\"https://download.dfinity.systems/ic/e446c64d99a97e38166be23ff2bfade997d15ff7/canisters/ic-icrc1-ledger.wasm.gz\")"
scripts.wasm:index:juno: dfx canister call icrc-factory --network juno set_index_wasm_from_url "(\"https://download.dfinity.systems/ic/e446c64d99a97e38166be23ff2bfade997d15ff7/canisters/ic-icrc1-index-ng.wasm.gz\")"
scripts.wasm:juno: npm run wasm:ledger:juno && npm run wasm:index:juno
scripts.start:juno: npm run deploy:juno && npm run wasm:juno
scripts.ledger:prod: dfx canister call icrc-factory --ic --wallet $(dfx identity get-wallet --ic) --with-cycles 1_100_000_000_000 create_icrc_ledger
scripts.index:prod: dfx canister call icrc-factory --ic --wallet $(dfx identity get-wallet --ic) --with-cycles 1_100_000_000_000 create_icrc_index
scripts.ledger:juno: dfx canister call icrc-factory --network juno --wallet $(dfx identity get-wallet --network juno) --with-cycles 1_100_000_000_000 create_icrc_ledger "(record { decimals = null; transfer_fee = null; minting_account = null; name = null; symbol = null; }, null,)"
